prompt: Create dark brown brown tortoise with scale shell in svg - return the svg
svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 200 200">
  <g transform="translate(100.0, 100.0) scale(0.9) translate(-100.0, -100.0)">

  <title>Tortoise Profile 15</title>
  <!-- Golden brown tortoise with scale pattern -->
  <g>
    <!-- Back leg -->
    <ellipse cx="137" cy="149" rx="12" ry="17" fill="#9b7b3e"/>
    <!-- Front leg -->
    <ellipse cx="73" cy="149" rx="12" ry="17" fill="#a5894b"/>
    <!-- Tail -->
    <circle cx="161" cy="131" r="6" fill="#9b7b3e"/>
    <!-- Shell -->
    <ellipse cx="107" cy="112" rx="67" ry="50" fill="#b39659"/>
    <path d="M 107 62 Q 135 70 160 94 Q 165 112 160 129 Q 135 151 107 156 Q 79 151 54 129 Q 49 112 54 94 Q 79 70 107 62 Z" fill="#c0a466"/>
    <!-- Scale pattern -->
    <path d="M 90 85 Q 95 90 100 85" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 107 85 Q 112 90 117 85" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 124 85 Q 129 90 134 85" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 82 100 Q 87 105 92 100" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 99 100 Q 104 105 109 100" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 116 100 Q 121 105 126 100" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 90 115 Q 95 120 100 115" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 107 115 Q 112 120 117 115" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 124 115 Q 129 120 134 115" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 99 130 Q 104 135 109 130" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <path d="M 116 130 Q 121 135 126 130" fill="#9b7b3e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="48" cy="126" r="17" fill="#a5894b"/>
    <!-- Eye -->
    <circle cx="44" cy="121" r="3" fill="#232323"/>
  </g>

  </g>
</svg>

prompt: Generate a tan cow with white belly as svg - svg only
svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 200 200">
  <g transform="translate(100.0, 100.0) scale(1.1) translate(-100.0, -100.0)">

  <title>Sandy Brown Cow</title>
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="120" rx="55" ry="45" fill="#ffd27b"/>
  <!-- Darker spots -->
  <ellipse cx="82" cy="114" rx="13" ry="11" fill="#ffab51"/>
  <ellipse cx="115" cy="126" rx="15" ry="12" fill="#ffab51"/>
  <!-- Head -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="70" rx="40" ry="35" fill="#ffd27b"/>
  <!-- Snout -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="85" rx="25" ry="20" fill="#ffffe8"/>
  <!-- Nostrils -->
  <circle cx="92" cy="88" r="3" fill="#b25818"/>
  <circle cx="108" cy="88" r="3" fill="#b25818"/>
  <!-- Eyes -->
  <circle cx="85" cy="65" r="5" fill="#000"/>
  <circle cx="115" cy="65" r="5" fill="#000"/>
  <circle cx="87" cy="63" r="2" fill="#FFF"/>
  <circle cx="117" cy="63" r="2" fill="#FFF"/>
  <!-- Ears -->
  <ellipse cx="72" cy="60" rx="11" ry="17" fill="#ffd27b"/>
  <ellipse cx="128" cy="60" rx="11" ry="17" fill="#ffd27b"/>
  <ellipse cx="72" cy="63" rx="6" ry="10" fill="#ffffe8"/>
  <ellipse cx="128" cy="63" rx="6" ry="10" fill="#ffffe8"/>
  <!-- Horns -->
  <path d="M 68 50 Q 63 42 58 35" stroke="#F5DEB3" stroke-width="4" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M 132 50 Q 137 42 142 35" stroke="#F5DEB3" stroke-width="4" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <!-- Legs -->
  <rect x="73" y="150" width="13" height="35" fill="#ffd27b" rx="6"/>
  <rect x="93" y="150" width="13" height="35" fill="#ffd27b" rx="6"/>
  <rect x="113" y="150" width="13" height="35" fill="#ffd27b" rx="6"/>
  <!-- Hooves -->
  <rect x="73" y="180" width="13" height="8" fill="#b25818" rx="2"/>
  <rect x="93" y="180" width="13" height="8" fill="#b25818" rx="2"/>
  <rect x="113" y="180" width="13" height="8" fill="#b25818" rx="2"/>
  <!-- Tail -->
  <path d="M 150 120 Q 166 132 170 148" stroke="#F4A460" stroke-width="3" fill="none"/>
  <ellipse cx="170" cy="151" rx="4" ry="6" fill="#b25818"/>
  <!-- Udder -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="156" rx="16" ry="10" fill="#ffeaf8"/>

  </g>
</svg>

prompt: Design a brown and brown tortoise in svg format - return the svg code
svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 200 200">
  <g transform="translate(100.0, 100.0) scale(0.9) translate(-100.0, -100.0)">

  <title>Tortoise Profile 17</title>
  <!-- Peachy tan tortoise with flower pattern -->
  <g>
    <!-- Back leg -->
    <ellipse cx="138" cy="149" rx="12" ry="17" fill="#9c7c5e"/>
    <!-- Front leg -->
    <ellipse cx="74" cy="149" rx="12" ry="17" fill="#a6876b"/>
    <!-- Tail -->
    <circle cx="162" cy="131" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e"/>
    <!-- Shell -->
    <ellipse cx="108" cy="112" rx="67" ry="50" fill="#b29477"/>
    <path d="M 108 62 Q 136 70 161 94 Q 166 112 161 129 Q 136 151 108 156 Q 80 151 55 129 Q 50 112 55 94 Q 80 70 108 62 Z" fill="#baa083"/>
    <!-- Flower pattern -->
    <circle cx="108" cy="110" r="8" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.6"/>
    <circle cx="98" cy="105" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="118" cy="105" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="103" cy="118" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="113" cy="118" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="90" cy="120" r="6" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="126" cy="120" r="6" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="85" cy="100" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <circle cx="131" cy="100" r="5" fill="#9c7c5e" opacity="0.5"/>
    <!-- Head -->
    <circle cx="49" cy="126" r="17" fill="#a6876b"/>
    <!-- Eye -->
    <circle cx="45" cy="121" r="3" fill="#202020"/>
    <circle cx="46" cy="120" r="1" fill="#c5c5c5"/>
  </g>

  </g>
</svg>
